name: Debate Club

refinement_effect.refine_one: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 60% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s..
refinement_effect.refine_two: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 75% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s..
refinement_effect.refine_three: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 90% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s..
refinement_effect.refine_four: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 105% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s..
refinement_effect.refine_five: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 120% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s..

description: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.
